219        int[] version = PlotSquared.platform().serverVersion();
220        if (version[1] >= 20) {
221            mutableDyes.add("HONEYCOMB");
222        }
223        DYES = Set.copyOf(mutableDyes);

300    {
301        try {
302            fieldPlayer = PlayerEvent.class.getDeclaredField("player");
303            fieldPlayer.setAccessible(true);
304        } catch (NoSuchFieldException e) {
305            e.printStackTrace();

308
309    @Inject
310    public PlayerEventListener(
311            final @NonNull PlotAreaManager plotAreaManager,
312            final @NonNull EventDispatcher eventDispatcher,
313            final @NonNull WorldEdit worldEdit,
314            final @NonNull PlotListener plotListener
315    ) {
316        this.eventDispatcher = eventDispatcher;
317        this.worldEdit = worldEdit;
318        this.plotAreaManager = plotAreaManager;
319        this.plotListener = plotListener;
320    }
321
322    @EventHandler(ignoreCancelled = true, priority = EventPriority.LOWEST)
323    public void onBlockBreak(final BlockBreakEvent event) {
324        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getBlock().getLocation());
325        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
326        if (area == null) {
327            return;
328        }
329        Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
330        if (plot != null) {
331            event.setDropItems(plot.getFlag(TileDropFlag.class));
332        }
333    }
334
335    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
336    public void onPlayerDyeSign(PlayerInteractEvent event) {
337        ItemStack itemStack = event.getItem();
338        if (itemStack == null) {
339            return;
340        }
341        Block block = event.getClickedBlock();
342        if (block != null && block.getState() instanceof Sign) {
343            if (DYES.contains(itemStack.getType().toString())) {
344                Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
345                PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
346                if (area == null) {
347                    return;
348                }
349                Plot plot = location.getOwnedPlot();
350                if (plot == null) {
351                    if (PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, EditSignFlag.class, false)
352                            && !event.getPlayer().hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_ROAD.toString())) {
353                        event.setCancelled(true);
354                    }
355                    return;
356                }
357                if (plot.isAdded(event.getPlayer().getUniqueId())) {
358                    return; // allow for added players
359                }
360                if (!plot.getFlag(EditSignFlag.class)
361                        && !event.getPlayer().hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER.toString())) {
362                    plot.debug(event.getPlayer().getName() + " could not color the sign because of edit-sign = false");
363                    event.setCancelled(true);
364                }
365            }
366        }
367    }
368
369    @EventHandler(ignoreCancelled = true)
370    public void onEffect(@NonNull EntityPotionEffectEvent event) {
371        if (Settings.Enabled_Components.DISABLE_BEACON_EFFECT_OVERFLOW ||
372                event.getCause() != EntityPotionEffectEvent.Cause.BEACON ||
373                !(event.getEntity() instanceof Player player)) {
374            return;
375        }
376
377        UUID uuid = player.getUniqueId();
378        PotionEffect effect = event.getNewEffect();
379        if (effect == null) {
380            PotionEffect oldEffect = event.getOldEffect();
381            if (oldEffect != null) {
382                String name = oldEffect.getType().getName();
383                plotListener.addEffect(uuid, name, -1);
384            }
385        } else {
386            long expiresAt = System.currentTimeMillis() + effect.getDuration() * 50L; //Convert ticks to milliseconds
387            String name = effect.getType().getName();
388            plotListener.addEffect(uuid, name, expiresAt);
389        }
390    }
391
392    @EventHandler
393    public void onVehicleEntityCollision(VehicleEntityCollisionEvent e) {
394        if (e.getVehicle() instanceof Boat) {
395            Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(e.getEntity().getLocation());
396            if (location.isPlotArea()) {
397                if (e.getEntity() instanceof Player) {
398                    PlotPlayer<Player> player = BukkitUtil.adapt((Player) e.getEntity());
399                    Plot plot = player.getCurrentPlot();
400                    if (plot != null) {
401                        if (!plot.isAdded(player.getUUID())) {
402                            //Here the event is only canceled if the player is not the owner
403                            //of the property on which he is located.
404                            e.setCancelled(true);
405                        }
406                    } else {
407                        e.setCancelled(true);
408                    }
409                } else {
410                    //Here the event is cancelled too, otherwise you can move the
411                    //boat with EchoPets or other mobs running around on the plot.
412                    e.setCancelled(true);
413                }
414            }
415        }
416    }
417
418    @EventHandler(ignoreCancelled = true, priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST)
419    public void playerCommand(PlayerCommandPreprocessEvent event) {
420        String msg = event.getMessage().replace("/", "").toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT).trim();
421        if (msg.isEmpty()) {
422            return;
423        }
424        Player player = event.getPlayer();
425        PlotPlayer<Player> plotPlayer = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
426        Location location = plotPlayer.getLocation();
427        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
428        if (area == null) {
429            return;
430        }
431        String[] parts = msg.split(" ");
432        Plot plot = plotPlayer.getCurrentPlot();
433        // Check WorldEdit
434        switch (parts[0]) {
435            case "up", "worldedit:up" -> {
436                if (plot == null || (!plot.isAdded(plotPlayer.getUUID()) && !plotPlayer.hasPermission(
437                        Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER,
438                        true
439                ))) {
440                    event.setCancelled(true);
441                    return;
442                }
443            }
444        }
445        if (plot == null && !area.isRoadFlags()) {
446            return;
447        }
448
449        List<String> blockedCommands = plot != null ?
450                plot.getFlag(BlockedCmdsFlag.class) :
451                area.getFlag(BlockedCmdsFlag.class);
452        if (blockedCommands.isEmpty()) {
453            return;
454        }
455        if (plotPlayer.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_BLOCKED_CMDS)) {
456            return;
457        }
458        // When using namespaced commands, we're not interested in the namespace
459        String part = parts[0];
460        if (part.contains(":")) {
461            String[] namespaced = part.split(":");
462            part = namespaced[1];
463            msg = msg.substring(namespaced[0].length() + 1);
464        }
465        msg = replaceAliases(msg, part);
466        for (String blocked : blockedCommands) {
467            if (blocked.equalsIgnoreCase(msg)) {
468                String perm;
469                if (plot != null && plot.isAdded(plotPlayer.getUUID())) {
470                    perm = "plots.admin.command.blocked-cmds.shared";
471                } else {
472                    perm = "plots.admin.command.blocked-cmds.road";
473                }
474                if (!plotPlayer.hasPermission(perm)) {
475                    plotPlayer.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("blockedcmds.command_blocked"));
476                    event.setCancelled(true);
477                }
478                return;
479            }
480        }
481    }
482
483    private String replaceAliases(String msg, String part) {
484        String s1 = part;
485        Set<String> aliases = new HashSet<>();
486        for (HelpTopic cmdLabel : Bukkit.getServer().getHelpMap().getHelpTopics()) {
487            if (part.equals(cmdLabel.getName())) {
488                break;
489            }
490            String label = cmdLabel.getName().replaceFirst("/", "");
491            if (aliases.contains(label)) {
492                continue;
493            }
494            PluginCommand p = Bukkit.getPluginCommand(label);
495            if (p != null) {
496                for (String a : p.getAliases()) {
497                    if (aliases.contains(a)) {
498                        continue;
499                    }
500                    aliases.add(a);
501                    a = a.replaceFirst("/", "");
502                    if (!a.equals(label) && a.equals(part)) {
503                        part = label;
504                        break;
505                    }
506                }
507            }
508        }
509        if (!s1.equals(part)) {
510            msg = msg.replace(s1, part);
511        }
512        return msg;
513    }
514
515    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
516    public void onPreLogin(final AsyncPlayerPreLoginEvent event) {
517        final UUID uuid;
518        if (Settings.UUID.OFFLINE) {
519            if (Settings.UUID.FORCE_LOWERCASE) {
520                uuid = UUID.nameUUIDFromBytes(("OfflinePlayer:" + event.getName().toLowerCase()).getBytes(Charsets.UTF_8));
521            } else {
522                uuid = UUID.nameUUIDFromBytes(("OfflinePlayer:" + event.getName()).getBytes(Charsets.UTF_8));
523            }
524        } else {
525            uuid = event.getUniqueId();
526        }
527        PlotSquared.get().getImpromptuUUIDPipeline().storeImmediately(event.getName(), uuid);
528    }
529
530    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
531    @SuppressWarnings("deprecation") // Paper deprecation
532    public void onConnect(PlayerJoinEvent event) {
533        final Player player = event.getPlayer();
534        PlotSquared.platform().playerManager().removePlayer(player.getUniqueId());
535        final PlotPlayer<Player> pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
536
537        // we're stripping the country code as we don't want to differ between countries
538        pp.setLocale(Locale.forLanguageTag(player.getLocale().substring(0, 2)));
539
540        Location location = pp.getLocation();
541        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
542        if (area != null) {
543            Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
544            if (plot != null) {
545                plotListener.plotEntry(pp, plot);
546            }
547        }
548        // Delayed
549
550        // Async
551        TaskManager.runTaskLaterAsync(
552                () -> {
553                    if (!player.hasPlayedBefore() && player.isOnline()) {
554                        player.saveData();
555                    }
556                    this.eventDispatcher.doJoinTask(pp);
557                }, TaskTime.seconds(1L)
558        );
559
560        if (pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_UPDATE_NOTIFICATION.toString()) && Settings.Enabled_Components.UPDATE_NOTIFICATIONS
561                && PremiumVerification.isPremium() && UpdateUtility.hasUpdate) {
562            Caption boundary = TranslatableCaption.of("update.update_boundary");
563            Caption updateNotification = TranslatableCaption.of("update.update_notification");
564            pp.sendMessage(boundary);
565            pp.sendMessage(
566                    updateNotification,
567                    TagResolver.builder()
568                            .tag("p2version", Tag.inserting(Component.text(UpdateUtility.internalVersion.versionString())))
569                            .tag("spigotversion", Tag.inserting(Component.text(UpdateUtility.spigotVersion)))
570                            .tag("downloadurl", Tag.preProcessParsed("https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/77506/updates"))
571                            .build()
572            );
573            pp.sendMessage(boundary);
574        }
575    }
576
577    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
578    public void playerRespawn(PlayerRespawnEvent event) {
579        Player player = event.getPlayer();
580        PlotPlayer<Player> pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
581        this.eventDispatcher.doRespawnTask(pp);
582    }

584    @SuppressWarnings("deprecation") // We explicitly want #getHomeSynchronous here
585    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
586    public void onTeleport(PlayerTeleportEvent event) {
587        Player player = event.getPlayer();
588        //We need to account for bad plugins like NoCheatPlus that teleports player on/before login -_-
589        if (!player.isOnline()) {
590            return;
591        }
592        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
593        try (final MetaDataAccess<Plot> lastPlotAccess =
594                     pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_LAST_PLOT)) {
595            Plot lastPlot = lastPlotAccess.get().orElse(null);
596            org.bukkit.Location to = event.getTo();
597            //noinspection ConstantConditions
598            if (to != null) {
599                Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(to);
600                PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
601                if (area == null) {
602                    if (lastPlot != null) {
603                        plotListener.plotExit(pp, lastPlot, null, null);
604                        lastPlotAccess.remove();
605                    }
606                    try (final MetaDataAccess<Location> lastLocationAccess =
607                                 pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_LOCATION)) {
608                        lastLocationAccess.remove();
609                    }
610                    return;
611                }
612                Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
613                if (plot != null && !plot.equals(lastPlot)) {
614                    final boolean result = DenyTeleportFlag.allowsTeleport(pp, plot);
615                    // there is one possibility to still allow teleportation:
616                    // to is identical to the plot's home location, and untrusted-visit is true
617                    // i.e. untrusted-visit can override deny-teleport
618                    // this is acceptable, because otherwise it wouldn't make sense to have both flags set
619                    if (result || (plot.getFlag(UntrustedVisitFlag.class) && plot
620                            .getHomeSynchronous()
621                            .equals(BukkitUtil.adaptComplete(to)))) {
622                        // returns false if the player is not allowed to enter the plot (if they are denied, for example)
623                        // don't let the move event cancel the entry after teleport, but rather catch and cancel early (#4647)
624                        if (!plotListener.plotEntry(pp, plot)) {
625                            event.setCancelled(true);
626                        }
627                    } else {
628                        pp.sendMessage(
629                                TranslatableCaption.of("deny.no_enter"),
630                                TagResolver.resolver("plot", Tag.inserting(Component.text(plot.toString())))
631                        );
632                        event.setCancelled(true);
633                    }
634                }
635            }
636        }
637        playerMove(event);
638    }
639
640    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
641    public void onWorldChanged(PlayerChangedWorldEvent event) {
642        Player player = event.getPlayer();
643        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
644        if (this.worldEdit != null) {
645            if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_WORLDEDIT_BYPASS)) {
646                if (pp.getAttribute("worldedit")) {
647                    pp.removeAttribute("worldedit");
648                }
649            }
650        }
651    }
652
653    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
654    public void vehicleMove(VehicleMoveEvent event)
655            throws IllegalAccessException {
656        final org.bukkit.Location from = event.getFrom();
657        final org.bukkit.Location to = event.getTo();
658
659        int toX, toZ;
660        if ((toX = MathMan.roundInt(to.getX())) != MathMan.roundInt(from.getX()) | (toZ = MathMan.roundInt(to.getZ())) != MathMan
661                .roundInt(from.getZ())) {
662            Vehicle vehicle = event.getVehicle();
663
664            // Check allowed
665            if (!vehicle.getPassengers().isEmpty()) {
666                Entity passenger = vehicle.getPassengers().get(0);
667
668                if (passenger instanceof final Player player) {
669                    // reset
670                    if (moveTmp == null) {
671                        moveTmp = new PlayerMoveEvent(null, from, to);
672                    }
673                    moveTmp.setFrom(from);
674                    moveTmp.setTo(to);
675                    moveTmp.setCancelled(false);
676                    fieldPlayer.set(moveTmp, player);
677
678                    List<Entity> passengers = vehicle.getPassengers();
679
680                    this.playerMove(moveTmp);
681                    org.bukkit.Location dest;
682                    if (moveTmp.isCancelled()) {
683                        dest = from;
684                    } else if (MathMan.roundInt(moveTmp.getTo().getX()) != toX || MathMan.roundInt(moveTmp
685                            .getTo()
686                            .getZ()) != toZ) {
687                        dest = to;
688                    } else {
689                        dest = null;
690                    }
691                    if (dest != null) {
692                        vehicle.eject();
693                        vehicle.setVelocity(new Vector(0d, 0d, 0d));
694                        PaperLib.teleportAsync(vehicle, dest);
695                        passengers.forEach(vehicle::addPassenger);
696                        return;
697                    }
698                }
699                if (Settings.Enabled_Components.KILL_ROAD_VEHICLES) {
700                    final com.sk89q.worldedit.world.entity.EntityType entityType = BukkitAdapter.adapt(vehicle.getType());
701                    // Horses etc are vehicles, but they're also animals
702                    // so this filters out all living entities
703                    if (EntityCategories.VEHICLE.contains(entityType) && !EntityCategories.ANIMAL.contains(entityType)) {
704                        List<MetadataValue> meta = vehicle.getMetadata("plot");
705                        Plot toPlot = BukkitUtil.adapt(to).getPlot();
706                        if (!meta.isEmpty()) {
707                            Plot origin = (Plot) meta.get(0).value();
708                            if (origin != null && !origin.getBasePlot(false).equals(toPlot)) {
709                                vehicle.remove();
710                            }
711                        } else if (toPlot != null) {
712                            vehicle.setMetadata("plot", new FixedMetadataValue((Plugin) PlotSquared.platform(), toPlot));
713                        }
714                    }
715                }
716            }
717
718        }
719    }
720
721    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
722    public void playerMove(PlayerMoveEvent event) {
723        org.bukkit.Location from = event.getFrom();
724        org.bukkit.Location to = event.getTo();
725        int x2;
726        if (MathMan.roundInt(from.getX()) != (x2 = MathMan.roundInt(to.getX()))) {
727            Player player = event.getPlayer();
728            BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
729            // Cancel teleport
730            if (TaskManager.removeFromTeleportQueue(pp.getName())) {
731                pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("teleport.teleport_failed"));
732            }
733            // Set last location
734            Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(to);
735            try (final MetaDataAccess<Location> lastLocationAccess =
736                         pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_LOCATION)) {
737                lastLocationAccess.remove();
738            }
739            PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
740            if (area == null) {
741                try (final MetaDataAccess<Plot> lastPlotAccess =
742                             pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_LAST_PLOT)) {
743                    lastPlotAccess.remove();
744                }
745                return;
746            }
747            Plot now = area.getPlot(location);
748            Plot lastPlot;
749            try (final MetaDataAccess<Plot> lastPlotAccess =
750                         pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_LAST_PLOT)) {
751                lastPlot = lastPlotAccess.get().orElse(null);
752            }
753            if (now == null) {
754                try (final MetaDataAccess<Boolean> kickAccess =
755                             pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_KICK)) {
756                    if (lastPlot != null && !plotListener.plotExit(pp, lastPlot, now, area) && this.tmpTeleport && !kickAccess.get().orElse(
757                            false)) {
758                        pp.sendMessage(
759                                TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
760                                TagResolver.resolver(
761                                        "node",
762                                        Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_EXIT_DENIED)
763                                )
764                        );
765                        this.tmpTeleport = false;
766                        if (lastPlot.equals(BukkitUtil.adapt(from).getPlot())) {
767                            player.teleport(from);
768                        } else {
769                            player.teleport(player.getWorld().getSpawnLocation());
770                        }
771                        this.tmpTeleport = true;
772                        event.setCancelled(true);
773                        return;
774                    }
775                }
776            } else if (now.equals(lastPlot)) {
777                ForceFieldListener.handleForcefield(player, pp, now);
778            } else if (!plotListener.plotEntry(pp, now) && this.tmpTeleport) {
779                pp.sendMessage(
780                        TranslatableCaption.of("deny.no_enter"),
781                        TagResolver.resolver("plot", Tag.inserting(Component.text(now.toString())))
782                );
783                this.tmpTeleport = false;
784                to.setX(from.getBlockX());
785                to.setY(from.getBlockY());
786                to.setZ(from.getBlockZ());
787                player.teleport(event.getTo());
788                this.tmpTeleport = true;
789                return;
790            }
791            int border = area.getBorder(true);
792            int x1;
793            if (x2 > border && this.tmpTeleport) {
794                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BYPASS_BORDER)) {
795                    to.setX(border - 1);
796                    this.tmpTeleport = false;
797                    player.teleport(event.getTo());
798                    this.tmpTeleport = true;
799                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.denied"));
800                } else if (MathMan.roundInt(from.getX()) <= border) { // Only send if they just moved out of the border
801                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.bypass.exited"));
802                }
803            } else if (x2 < -border && this.tmpTeleport) {
804                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BYPASS_BORDER)) {
805                    to.setX(-border + 1);
806                    this.tmpTeleport = false;
807                    player.teleport(event.getTo());
808                    this.tmpTeleport = true;
809                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.denied"));
810                } else if (MathMan.roundInt(from.getX()) >= -border) { // Only send if they just moved out of the border
811                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.bypass.exited"));
812                }
813            } else if (((x1 = MathMan.roundInt(from.getX())) >= border && x2 <= border) || (x1 <= -border && x2 >= -border)) {
814                if (pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BYPASS_BORDER)) {
815                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.bypass.entered"));
816                }
817            }
818        }
819        int z2;
820        if (MathMan.roundInt(from.getZ()) != (z2 = MathMan.roundInt(to.getZ()))) {
821            Player player = event.getPlayer();
822            BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
823            // Cancel teleport
824            if (TaskManager.removeFromTeleportQueue(pp.getName())) {
825                pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("teleport.teleport_failed"));
826            }
827            // Set last location
828            Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(to);
829            try (final MetaDataAccess<Location> lastLocationAccess =
830                         pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_LOCATION)) {
831                lastLocationAccess.set(location);
832            }
833            PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
834            if (area == null) {
835                try (final MetaDataAccess<Plot> lastPlotAccess =
836                             pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_LAST_PLOT)) {
837                    lastPlotAccess.remove();
838                }
839                return;
840            }
841            Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
842            Plot lastPlot;
843            try (final MetaDataAccess<Plot> lastPlotAccess =
844                         pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_LAST_PLOT)) {
845                lastPlot = lastPlotAccess.get().orElse(null);
846            }
847            if (plot == null) {
848                try (final MetaDataAccess<Boolean> kickAccess =
849                             pp.accessTemporaryMetaData(PlayerMetaDataKeys.TEMPORARY_KICK)) {
850                    if (lastPlot != null && !plotListener.plotExit(pp, lastPlot, null, area) && this.tmpTeleport && !kickAccess.get().orElse(
851                            false)) {
852                        pp.sendMessage(
853                                TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
854                                TagResolver.resolver(
855                                        "node",
856                                        Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_EXIT_DENIED)
857                                )
858                        );
859                        this.tmpTeleport = false;
860                        if (lastPlot.equals(BukkitUtil.adapt(from).getPlot())) {
861                            player.teleport(from);
862                        } else {
863                            player.teleport(player.getWorld().getSpawnLocation());
864                        }
865                        this.tmpTeleport = true;
866                        event.setCancelled(true);
867                        return;
868                    }
869                }
870            } else if (plot.equals(lastPlot)) {
871                ForceFieldListener.handleForcefield(player, pp, plot);
872            } else if (!plotListener.plotEntry(pp, plot) && this.tmpTeleport) {
873                pp.sendMessage(
874                        TranslatableCaption.of("deny.no_enter"),
875                        TagResolver.resolver("plot", Tag.inserting(Component.text(plot.toString())))
876                );
877                this.tmpTeleport = false;
878                player.teleport(from);
879                to.setX(from.getBlockX());
880                to.setY(from.getBlockY());
881                to.setZ(from.getBlockZ());
882                player.teleport(event.getTo());
883                this.tmpTeleport = true;
884                return;
885            }
886            int border = area.getBorder(true);
887            int z1;
888            if (z2 > border && this.tmpTeleport) {
889                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BYPASS_BORDER)) {
890                    to.setZ(border - 1);
891                    this.tmpTeleport = false;
892                    player.teleport(event.getTo());
893                    this.tmpTeleport = true;
894                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.denied"));
895                } else if (MathMan.roundInt(from.getZ()) <= border) { // Only send if they just moved out of the border
896                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.bypass.exited"));
897                }
898            } else if (z2 < -border && this.tmpTeleport) {
899                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BYPASS_BORDER)) {
900                    to.setZ(-border + 1);
901                    this.tmpTeleport = false;
902                    player.teleport(event.getTo());
903                    this.tmpTeleport = true;
904                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.denied"));
905                } else if (MathMan.roundInt(from.getZ()) >= -border) { // Only send if they just moved out of the border
906                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.bypass.exited"));
907                }
908            } else if (((z1 = MathMan.roundInt(from.getZ())) >= border && z2 <= border) || (z1 <= -border && z2 >= -border)) {
909                if (pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BYPASS_BORDER)) {
910                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("border.bypass.entered"));
911                }
912            }
913        }
914    }
915
916    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.LOW)
917    @SuppressWarnings("deprecation") // Paper deprecation
918    public void onChat(AsyncPlayerChatEvent event) {
919        if (event.isCancelled()) {
920            return;
921        }
922
923        BukkitPlayer plotPlayer = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getPlayer());
924        Location location = plotPlayer.getLocation();
925        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
926        if (area == null) {
927            return;
928        }
929        Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
930        if (plot == null) {
931            return;
932        }
933        if (!((plot.getFlag(ChatFlag.class) && area.isPlotChat() && plotPlayer.getAttribute("chat"))
934                || area.isForcingPlotChat())) {
935            return;
936        }
937        if (plot.isDenied(plotPlayer.getUUID()) && !plotPlayer.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_CHAT_BYPASS)) {
938            return;
939        }
940        event.setCancelled(true);
941        Set<Player> recipients = event.getRecipients();
942        recipients.clear();
943        Set<PlotPlayer<?>> spies = new HashSet<>();
944        Set<PlotPlayer<?>> plotRecipients = new HashSet<>();
945        for (final PlotPlayer<?> pp : PlotSquared.platform().playerManager().getPlayers()) {
946            if (pp.getAttribute("chatspy")) {
947                spies.add(pp);
948            } else {
949                Plot current = pp.getCurrentPlot();
950                if (current != null && current.getBasePlot(false).equals(plot)) {
951                    plotRecipients.add(pp);
952                }
953            }
954        }
955        String message = event.getMessage();
956        String sender = event.getPlayer().getDisplayName();
957        PlotId id = plot.getId();
958        String worldName = plot.getWorldName();
959        Caption msg = TranslatableCaption.of("chat.plot_chat_format");
960        TagResolver.Builder builder = TagResolver.builder();
961        builder.tag("world", Tag.inserting(Component.text(worldName)));
962        builder.tag("plot_id", Tag.inserting(Component.text(id.toString())));
963        builder.tag("sender", Tag.inserting(Component.text(sender)));
964        if (plotPlayer.hasPermission("plots.chat.color")) {
965            builder.tag(
966                    "msg", Tag.inserting(MiniMessage.miniMessage().deserialize(
967                            message,
968                            TagResolver.resolver(
969                                    StandardTags.color(), StandardTags.gradient(),
970                                    StandardTags.rainbow(), StandardTags.decorations()
971                            )
972                    ))
973            );
974        } else {
975            builder.tag("msg", Tag.inserting(Component.text(message)));
976        }
977        for (PlotPlayer<?> receiver : plotRecipients) {
978            receiver.sendMessage(msg, builder.build());
979        }
980        if (!spies.isEmpty()) {
981            Caption spymsg = TranslatableCaption.of("chat.plot_chat_spy_format");
982            for (PlotPlayer<?> player : spies) {
983                player.sendMessage(spymsg, builder.tag("message", Tag.inserting(Component.text(message))).build());
984            }
985        }
986        if (Settings.Chat.LOG_PLOTCHAT_TO_CONSOLE) {
987            Caption spymsg = TranslatableCaption.of("chat.plot_chat_spy_format");
988            ConsolePlayer.getConsole().sendMessage(
989                    spymsg,
990                    builder.tag("message", Tag.inserting(Component.text(message))).build()
991            );
992        }
993    }
994
995    @SuppressWarnings("deprecation")
996    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
997    public void onInventoryClick(InventoryClickEvent event) {
998        /*if (!event.isLeftClick() || (event.getAction() != InventoryAction.PLACE_ALL) || event
999            .isShiftClick()) {
1000            return;
1001        }*/
1002        HumanEntity entity = event.getWhoClicked();
1003        if (!(entity instanceof Player) || !this.plotAreaManager
1004                .hasPlotArea(entity.getWorld().getName())) {
1005            return;
1006        }
1007
1008        HumanEntity clicker = event.getWhoClicked();
1009        if (!(clicker instanceof Player player)) {
1010            return;
1011        }
1012        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
1013        final PlotInventory inventory = PlotInventory.getOpenPlotInventory(pp);
1014        if (inventory != null && event.getRawSlot() == event.getSlot()) {
1015            if (!inventory.onClick(event.getSlot())) {
1016                event.setResult(Event.Result.DENY);
1017                event.setCancelled(true);
1018                inventory.close();
1019            }
1020        }
1021        PlayerInventory inv = player.getInventory();
1022        int slot = inv.getHeldItemSlot();
1023        if ((slot > 8) || !event.getEventName().equals("InventoryCreativeEvent")) {
1024            return;
1025        }
1026        ItemStack oldItem = inv.getItemInHand();
1027        ItemMeta oldMeta = oldItem.getItemMeta();
1028        ItemStack newItem = event.getCursor();
1029        ItemMeta newMeta = newItem.getItemMeta();
1030
1031        if (event.getClick() == ClickType.CREATIVE) {
1032            final Plot plot = pp.getCurrentPlot();
1033            if (plot != null) {
1034                if (plot.getFlag(PreventCreativeCopyFlag.class) && !plot
1035                        .isAdded(player.getUniqueId()) && !pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER)) {
1036                    final ItemStack newStack =
1037                            new ItemStack(newItem.getType(), newItem.getAmount());
1038                    event.setCursor(newStack);
1039                    plot.debug(player.getName()
1040                            + " could not creative-copy an item because prevent-creative-copy = true");
1041                }
1042            } else {
1043                PlotArea area = pp.getPlotAreaAbs();
1044                if (area != null && PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, PreventCreativeCopyFlag.class, true)) {
1045                    final ItemStack newStack =
1046                            new ItemStack(newItem.getType(), newItem.getAmount());
1047                    event.setCursor(newStack);
1048                }
1049            }
1050            return;
1051        }
1052
1053        String newLore = "";
1054        if (newMeta != null) {
1055            List<String> lore = newMeta.getLore();
1056            if (lore != null) {
1057                newLore = lore.toString();
1058            }
1059        }
1060        String oldLore = "";
1061        if (oldMeta != null) {
1062            List<String> lore = oldMeta.getLore();
1063            if (lore != null) {
1064                oldLore = lore.toString();
1065            }
1066        }
1067        Material itemType = newItem.getType();
1068        if (!"[(+NBT)]".equals(newLore) || (oldItem.equals(newItem) && newLore.equals(oldLore))) {
1069            if (newMeta == null || (itemType != Material.LEGACY_BANNER && itemType != Material.PLAYER_HEAD)) {
1070                return;
1071            }
1072        }
1073        Block block = player.getTargetBlock(null, 7);
1074        org.bukkit.block.BlockState state = block.getState();
1075        Material stateType = state.getType();
1076        if (stateType != itemType) {
1077            if (stateType == Material.LEGACY_WALL_BANNER || stateType == Material.LEGACY_STANDING_BANNER) {
1078                if (itemType != Material.LEGACY_BANNER) {
1079                    return;
1080                }
1081            } else if (stateType == Material.LEGACY_SKULL) {
1082                if (itemType != Material.LEGACY_SKULL_ITEM) {
1083                    return;
1084                }
1085            } else {
1086                return;
1087            }
1088        }
1089        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(state.getLocation());
1090        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1091        if (area == null) {
1092            return;
1093        }
1094        Plot plot = area.getPlotAbs(location);
1095        boolean cancelled = false;
1096        if (plot == null) {
1097            if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_ROAD)) {
1098                pp.sendMessage(
1099                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1100                        TagResolver.resolver(
1101                                "node",
1102                                Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_ROAD)
1103                        )
1104                );
1105                cancelled = true;
1106            }
1107        } else if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
1108            if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_UNOWNED)) {
1109                pp.sendMessage(
1110                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1111                        TagResolver.resolver(
1112                                "node",
1113                                Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_UNOWNED)
1114                        )
1115                );
1116                cancelled = true;
1117            }
1118        } else {
1119            UUID uuid = pp.getUUID();
1120            if (!plot.isAdded(uuid)) {
1121                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER)) {
1122                    pp.sendMessage(
1123                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1124                            TagResolver.resolver(
1125                                    "node",
1126                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER)
1127                            )
1128                    );
1129                    cancelled = true;
1130                }
1131            }
1132        }
1133        if (cancelled) {
1134            if ((oldItem.getType() == newItem.getType()) && (oldItem.getDurability() == newItem
1135                    .getDurability())) {
1136                event.setCursor(
1137                        new ItemStack(newItem.getType(), newItem.getAmount(), newItem.getDurability()));
1138                event.setCancelled(true);
1139                return;
1140            }
1141            event.setCursor(
1142                    new ItemStack(newItem.getType(), newItem.getAmount(), newItem.getDurability()));
1143        }
1144    }
1145
1146    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
1147    public void onInteract(PlayerInteractAtEntityEvent e) {
1148        Entity entity = e.getRightClicked();
1149        if (!(entity instanceof ArmorStand) && !(entity instanceof ItemFrame)) {
1150            return;
1151        }
1152        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(e.getRightClicked().getLocation());
1153        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1154        if (area == null) {
1155            return;
1156        }
1157        EntitySpawnListener.testNether(entity);
1158        Plot plot = location.getPlotAbs();
1159        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(e.getPlayer());
1160        if (plot == null) {
1161            if (!PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, MiscInteractFlag.class, true) && !pp.hasPermission(
1162                    Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_ROAD
1163            )) {
1164                pp.sendMessage(
1165                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1166                        TagResolver.resolver(
1167                                "node",
1168                                Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_ROAD)
1169                        )
1170                );
1171                e.setCancelled(true);
1172            }
1173        } else {
1174            if (Settings.Done.RESTRICT_BUILDING && DoneFlag.isDone(plot)) {
1175                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)) {
1176                    pp.sendMessage(TranslatableCaption.of("done.building_restricted"));
1177                    e.setCancelled(true);
1178                    return;
1179                }
1180            }
1181            if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
1182                if (!pp.hasPermission("plots.admin.interact.unowned")) {
1183                    pp.sendMessage(
1184                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1185                            TagResolver.resolver(
1186                                    "node",
1187                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_UNOWNED)
1188                            )
1189                    );
1190                    e.setCancelled(true);
1191                }
1192            } else {
1193                UUID uuid = pp.getUUID();
1194                if (plot.isAdded(uuid)) {
1195                    return;
1196                }
1197                if (plot.getFlag(MiscInteractFlag.class)) {
1198                    return;
1199                }
1200                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER)) {
1201                    pp.sendMessage(
1202                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1203                            TagResolver.resolver(
1204                                    "node",
1205                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER)
1206                            )
1207                    );
1208                    e.setCancelled(true);
1209                    plot.debug(pp.getName() + " could not interact with " + entity.getType()
1210                            + " because misc-interact = false");
1211                }
1212            }
1213        }
1214    }
1215
1216    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.LOW)
1217    @SuppressWarnings("deprecation") // Paper deprecation
1218    public void onCancelledInteract(PlayerInteractEvent event) {
1219        if (event.isCancelled() && event.getAction() == Action.RIGHT_CLICK_AIR) {
1220            Player player = event.getPlayer();
1221            BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
1222            PlotArea area = pp.getPlotAreaAbs();
1223            if (area == null) {
1224                return;
1225            }
1226            if (event.getAction() == Action.RIGHT_CLICK_AIR) {
1227                Material item = event.getMaterial();
1228                if (item.toString().toLowerCase().endsWith("_egg")) {
1229                    event.setCancelled(true);
1230                    event.setUseItemInHand(Event.Result.DENY);
1231                }
1232            }
1233            ItemStack hand = player.getInventory().getItemInMainHand();
1234            ItemStack offHand = player.getInventory().getItemInOffHand();
1235            Material type = hand.getType();
1236            Material offType = offHand.getType();
1237            if (type == Material.AIR) {
1238                type = offType;
1239            }
1240            if (type.toString().toLowerCase().endsWith("_egg")) {
1241                Block block = player.getTargetBlockExact(5, FluidCollisionMode.SOURCE_ONLY);
1242                if (block != null && block.getType() != Material.AIR) {
1243                    Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
1244                    if (!this.eventDispatcher.checkPlayerBlockEvent(pp, PlayerBlockEventType.SPAWN_MOB, location, null, true)) {
1245                        event.setCancelled(true);
1246                        event.setUseItemInHand(Event.Result.DENY);
1247                    }
1248                }
1249            }
1250        }
1251    }
1252
1253    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.LOW, ignoreCancelled = true)
1254    public void onInteract(PlayerInteractEvent event) {
1255        Player player = event.getPlayer();
1256        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
1257        PlotArea area = pp.getPlotAreaAbs();
1258        if (area == null) {
1259            return;
1260        }
1261        PlayerBlockEventType eventType;
1262        BlockType blocktype1;
1263        Block block = event.getClickedBlock();
1264        if (block == null) {
1265            // We do not care in this case, the player is likely interacting with air ("nothing").
1266            return;
1267        }
1268        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
1269        Action action = event.getAction();
1270        switch (action) {
1271            case PHYSICAL -> {
1272                eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.TRIGGER_PHYSICAL;
1273                blocktype1 = BukkitAdapter.asBlockType(block.getType());
1274            }
1275
1276            //todo rearrange the right click code. it is all over the place.
1277            case RIGHT_CLICK_BLOCK -> {
1278                Material blockType = block.getType();
1279                eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.INTERACT_BLOCK;
1280                blocktype1 = BukkitAdapter.asBlockType(block.getType());
1281
1282                if (INTERACTABLE_MATERIALS != null
1283                        ? INTERACTABLE_MATERIALS.contains(blockType.name())
1284                        : blockType.isInteractable()) {
1285                    if (!player.isSneaking()) {
1286                        break;
1287                    }
1288                    ItemStack hand = player.getInventory().getItemInMainHand();
1289                    ItemStack offHand = player.getInventory().getItemInOffHand();
1290
1291                    // sneaking players interact with blocks if both hands are empty
1292                    if (hand.getType() == Material.AIR && offHand.getType() == Material.AIR) {
1293                        break;
1294                    }
1295                }
1296
1297                Material type = event.getMaterial();
1298
1299                // in the following, lb needs to have the material of the item in hand i.e. type
1300                switch (type.toString()) {
1301                    case "REDSTONE", "STRING", "PUMPKIN_SEEDS", "MELON_SEEDS", "COCOA_BEANS", "WHEAT_SEEDS", "BEETROOT_SEEDS",
1302                         "SWEET_BERRIES", "GLOW_BERRIES" -> {
1303                        return;
1304                    }
1305                    default -> {
1306                        //eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.PLACE_BLOCK;
1307                        if (type.isBlock()) {
1308                            return;
1309                        }
1310                    }
1311                }
1312                if (PaperLib.isPaper()) {
1313                    if (MaterialTags.SPAWN_EGGS.isTagged(type) || Material.EGG.equals(type)) {
1314                        eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.SPAWN_MOB;
1315                        break;
1316                    }
1317                } else {
1318                    if (type.toString().toLowerCase().endsWith("egg")) {
1319                        eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.SPAWN_MOB;
1320                        break;
1321                    }
1322                }
1323                if (type.isEdible()) {
1324                    //Allow all players to eat while also allowing the block place event to be fired
1325                    return;
1326                }
1327                // Process creature spawning of armor stands & end crystals here if spawned by the player in order to be able to
1328                // reset the player's hand item if spawning needs to be cancelled.
1329                if (type == Material.ARMOR_STAND || type == Material.END_CRYSTAL) {
1330                    Plot plot = location.getOwnedPlotAbs();
1331                    EntityType entityType = type == Material.ARMOR_STAND ? EntityType.ARMOR_STAND : END_CRYSTAL_ENTITY_TYPE;
1332                    if (BukkitEntityUtil.checkEntity(entityType, plot)) {
1333                        event.setCancelled(true);
1334                        break;
1335                    }
1336                }
1337                // Continue with normal place event checks
1338                if (type == Material.ARMOR_STAND) {
1339                    location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getRelative(event.getBlockFace()).getLocation());
1340                    eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.PLACE_MISC;
1341                }
1342                if (org.bukkit.Tag.ITEMS_BOATS.isTagged(type) || MINECARTS.contains(type)) {
1343                    eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.PLACE_VEHICLE;
1344                    break;
1345                }
1346                if (type == Material.FIREWORK_ROCKET || type == Material.FIREWORK_STAR) {
1347                    eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.SPAWN_MOB;
1348                    break;
1349                }
1350                if (BOOKS.contains(type)) {
1351                    eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.READ;
1352                    break;
1353                }
1354            }
1355            case LEFT_CLICK_BLOCK -> {
1356                Material blockType = block.getType();
1357
1358                // todo: when the code above is rearranged, it would be great to beautify this as well.
1359                // will code this as a temporary, specific bug fix (for dragon eggs)
1360                if (blockType != Material.DRAGON_EGG) {
1361                    return;
1362                }
1363
1364                eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.INTERACT_BLOCK;
1365                blocktype1 = BukkitAdapter.asBlockType(block.getType());
1366            }
1367            default -> {
1368                return;
1369            }
1370        }
1371        if (this.worldEdit != null && pp.getAttribute("worldedit")) {
1372            if (event.getMaterial() == Material.getMaterial(this.worldEdit.getConfiguration().wandItem)) {
1373                return;
1374            }
1375        }
1376        if (!this.eventDispatcher.checkPlayerBlockEvent(pp, eventType, location, blocktype1, true)) {
1377            event.setCancelled(true);
1378            event.setUseInteractedBlock(Event.Result.DENY);
1379        }
1380    }
1381
1382    // Boats can sometimes be placed on interactable blocks such as levers,
1383    // see PS-175. Armor stands, minecarts and end crystals (the other entities
1384    // supported by this event) don't have this issue.
1385    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.LOW, ignoreCancelled = true)
1386    public void onBoatPlace(EntityPlaceEvent event) {
1387        Player player = event.getPlayer();
1388        if (player == null) {
1389            return;
1390        }
1391        Entity placed = event.getEntity();
1392        if (!(placed instanceof Boat)) {
1393            return;
1394        }
1395        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getPlayer());
1396        PlotArea area = pp.getPlotAreaAbs();
1397        if (area == null) {
1398            return;
1399        }
1400        PlayerBlockEventType eventType = PlayerBlockEventType.PLACE_VEHICLE;
1401        Block block = event.getBlock();
1402        BlockType blockType = BukkitAdapter.asBlockType(block.getType());
1403        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
1404        if (!PlotSquared.get().getEventDispatcher()
1405                .checkPlayerBlockEvent(pp, eventType, location, blockType, true)) {
1406            event.setCancelled(true);
1407        }
1408    }
1409
1410    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
1411    public void onBucketEmpty(PlayerBucketEmptyEvent event) {
1412        final Block block = event.getBlock();
1413        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
1414        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1415        if (area == null) {
1416            return;
1417        }
1418        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getPlayer());
1419        Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
1420        final List<BlockTypeWrapper> use =
1421                Optional.ofNullable(plot).map(p -> p.getFlag(UseFlag.class)).orElse(area.isRoadFlags() ?
1422                        area.getFlag(UseFlag.class) : Collections.emptyList());
1423        BlockType type = BukkitAdapter.asBlockType(block.getType());
1424        for (final BlockTypeWrapper blockTypeWrapper : use) {
1425            if (blockTypeWrapper.accepts(BlockTypes.AIR) || blockTypeWrapper
1426                    .accepts(type)) {
1427                return;
1428            }
1429        }
1430        if (plot == null) {
1431            if (pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_ROAD)) {
1432                return;
1433            }
1434            pp.sendMessage(
1435                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1436                    TagResolver.resolver("node", Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_ROAD))
1437            );
1438            event.setCancelled(true);
1439        } else if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
1440            if (pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_UNOWNED)) {
1441                return;
1442            }
1443            pp.sendMessage(
1444                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1445                    TagResolver.resolver(
1446                            "node",
1447                            Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_UNOWNED)
1448                    )
1449            );
1450            event.setCancelled(true);
1451        } else if (!plot.isAdded(pp.getUUID())) {
1452            if (pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)) {
1453                return;
1454            }
1455            pp.sendMessage(
1456                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1457                    TagResolver.resolver(
1458                            "node",
1459                            Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)
1460                    )
1461            );
1462            event.setCancelled(true);
1463        } else if (Settings.Done.RESTRICT_BUILDING && DoneFlag.isDone(plot)) {
1464            if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)) {
1465                pp.sendMessage(
1466                        TranslatableCaption.of("done.building_restricted")
1467                );
1468                event.setCancelled(true);
1469            }
1470        }
1471    }
1472
1473    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST)
1474    public void onInventoryClose(InventoryCloseEvent event) {
1475        HumanEntity closer = event.getPlayer();
1476        if (!(closer instanceof Player player)) {
1477            return;
1478        }
1479        PlotInventory.removePlotInventoryOpen(BukkitUtil.adapt(player));
1480    }

1482    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.MONITOR)
1483    public void onLeave(PlayerQuitEvent event) {
1484        TaskManager.removeFromTeleportQueue(event.getPlayer().getName());
1485        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getPlayer());
1486        pp.unregister();
1487        plotListener.logout(pp.getUUID());
1488    }
