1490    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
1491    public void onBucketFill(PlayerBucketFillEvent event) {
1492        Block blockClicked = event.getBlockClicked();
1493        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(blockClicked.getLocation());
1494        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1495        if (area == null) {
1496            return;
1497        }
1498        Player player = event.getPlayer();
1499        BukkitPlayer plotPlayer = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
1500        Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
1501        final List<BlockTypeWrapper> use =
1502                Optional.ofNullable(plot).map(p -> p.getFlag(UseFlag.class)).orElse(area.isRoadFlags() ?
1503                        area.getFlag(UseFlag.class) : Collections.emptyList());
1504        BlockType type = BukkitAdapter.asBlockType(blockClicked.getType());
1505        for (final BlockTypeWrapper blockTypeWrapper : use) {
1506            if (blockTypeWrapper.accepts(BlockTypes.AIR) || blockTypeWrapper
1507                    .accepts(type)) {
1508                return;
1509            }
1510        }
1511        if (plot == null) {
1512            if (plotPlayer.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_ROAD)) {
1513                return;
1514            }
1515            plotPlayer.sendMessage(
1516                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1517                    TagResolver.resolver("node", Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_ROAD))
1518            );
1519            event.setCancelled(true);
1520        } else if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
1521            if (plotPlayer.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_UNOWNED)) {
1522                return;
1523            }
1524            plotPlayer.sendMessage(
1525                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1526                    TagResolver.resolver(
1527                            "node",
1528                            Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_UNOWNED)
1529                    )
1530            );
1531            event.setCancelled(true);
1532        } else if (!plot.isAdded(plotPlayer.getUUID())) {
1533            if (plotPlayer.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)) {
1534                return;
1535            }
1536            plotPlayer.sendMessage(
1537                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1538                    TagResolver.resolver(
1539                            "node",
1540                            Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)
1541                    )
1542            );
1543            event.setCancelled(true);
1544        } else if (Settings.Done.RESTRICT_BUILDING && DoneFlag.isDone(plot)) {
1545            if (!plotPlayer.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)) {
1546                plotPlayer.sendMessage(
1547                        TranslatableCaption.of("done.building_restricted")
1548                );
1549                event.setCancelled(true);
1550            }
1551        }
1552    }
1553
1554    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
1555    public void onHangingPlace(HangingPlaceEvent event) {
1556        Block block = event.getBlock().getRelative(event.getBlockFace());
1557        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(block.getLocation());
1558        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1559        if (area == null) {
1560            return;
1561        }
1562        Player p = event.getPlayer();
1563        if (p == null) {
1564            event.setCancelled(true);
1565            return;
1566        }
1567        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(p);
1568        Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
1569        if (plot == null) {
1570            if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_ROAD)) {
1571                pp.sendMessage(
1572                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1573                        TagResolver.resolver(
1574                                "node",
1575                                Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_ROAD)
1576                        )
1577                );
1578                event.setCancelled(true);
1579            }
1580        } else {
1581            if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
1582                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_UNOWNED)) {
1583                    pp.sendMessage(
1584                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1585                            TagResolver.resolver(
1586                                    "node",
1587                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_UNOWNED)
1588                            )
1589                    );
1590                    event.setCancelled(true);
1591                }
1592                return;
1593            }
1594            if (!plot.isAdded(pp.getUUID())) {
1595                if (!plot.getFlag(HangingPlaceFlag.class)) {
1596                    if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)) {
1597                        pp.sendMessage(
1598                                TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1599                                TagResolver.resolver(
1600                                        "node",
1601                                        Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_BUILD_OTHER)
1602                                )
1603                        );
1604                        event.setCancelled(true);
1605                    }
1606                    return;
1607                }
1608            }
1609            if (BukkitEntityUtil.checkEntity(event.getEntity(), plot)) {
1610                event.setCancelled(true);
1611            }
1612
1613        }
1614    }
1615
1616    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
1617    public void onHangingBreakByEntity(HangingBreakByEntityEvent event) {
1618        Entity remover = event.getRemover();
1619        if (remover instanceof Player p) {
1620            Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getEntity().getLocation());
1621            PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1622            if (area == null) {
1623                return;
1624            }
1625            BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(p);
1626            Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
1627            if (plot == null) {
1628                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_ROAD)) {
1629                    pp.sendMessage(
1630                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1631                            TagResolver.resolver(
1632                                    "node",
1633                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_ROAD)
1634                            )
1635                    );
1636                    event.setCancelled(true);
1637                }
1638            } else if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
1639                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_UNOWNED)) {
1640                    pp.sendMessage(
1641                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1642                            TagResolver.resolver(
1643                                    "node",
1644                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_UNOWNED)
1645                            )
1646                    );
1647                    event.setCancelled(true);
1648                }
1649            } else if (!plot.isAdded(pp.getUUID())) {
1650                if (plot.getFlag(HangingBreakFlag.class)) {
1651                    return;
1652                }
1653                if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_OTHER)) {
1654                    pp.sendMessage(
1655                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1656                            TagResolver.resolver(
1657                                    "node",
1658                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_OTHER)
1659                            )
1660                    );
1661                    event.setCancelled(true);
1662                    plot.debug(p.getName()
1663                            + " could not break hanging entity because hanging-break = false");
1664                }
1665            }
1666        } else if (remover instanceof Projectile p) {
1667            if (p.getShooter() instanceof Player shooter) {
1668                Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getEntity().getLocation());
1669                PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1670                if (area == null) {
1671                    return;
1672                }
1673                BukkitPlayer player = BukkitUtil.adapt(shooter);
1674                Plot plot = area.getPlot(BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getEntity().getLocation()));
1675                if (plot != null) {
1676                    if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
1677                        if (!player.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_UNOWNED)) {
1678                            player.sendMessage(
1679                                    TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1680                                    TagResolver.resolver(
1681                                            "node",
1682                                            Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_UNOWNED)
1683                                    )
1684                            );
1685                            event.setCancelled(true);
1686                        }
1687                    } else if (!plot.isAdded(player.getUUID())) {
1688                        if (!plot.getFlag(HangingBreakFlag.class)) {
1689                            if (!player.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_OTHER)) {
1690                                player.sendMessage(
1691                                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1692                                        TagResolver.resolver(
1693                                                "node",
1694                                                Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_OTHER)
1695                                        )
1696                                );
1697                                event.setCancelled(true);
1698                                plot.debug(player.getName()
1699                                        + " could not break hanging entity because hanging-break = false");
1700                            }
1701                        }
1702                    }
1703                }
1704            }
1705        } else {
1706            event.setCancelled(true);
1707        }
1708    }
1709
1710    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
1711    public void onPlayerInteractEntity(PlayerInteractEntityEvent event) {
1712        if (event.getRightClicked().getType() == EntityType.UNKNOWN) {
1713            return;
1714        }
1715        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getRightClicked().getLocation());
1716        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1717        if (area == null) {
1718            return;
1719        }
1720        Player p = event.getPlayer();
1721        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(p);
1722        Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
1723        if (plot == null && !area.isRoadFlags()) {
1724            if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_ROAD)) {
1725                pp.sendMessage(
1726                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1727                        TagResolver.resolver(
1728                                "node",
1729                                Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_ROAD)
1730                        )
1731                );
1732                event.setCancelled(true);
1733            }
1734        } else if (plot != null && !plot.hasOwner()) {
1735            if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_UNOWNED)) {
1736                pp.sendMessage(
1737                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1738                        TagResolver.resolver(
1739                                "node",
1740                                Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_UNOWNED)
1741                        )
1742                );
1743                event.setCancelled(true);
1744            }
1745        } else if ((plot != null && !plot.isAdded(pp.getUUID())) || (plot == null && area
1746                .isRoadFlags())) {
1747            final Entity entity = event.getRightClicked();
1748            final com.sk89q.worldedit.world.entity.EntityType entityType =
1749                    BukkitAdapter.adapt(entity.getType());
1750
1751            FlagContainer flagContainer;
1752            if (plot == null) {
1753                flagContainer = area.getRoadFlagContainer();
1754            } else {
1755                flagContainer = plot.getFlagContainer();
1756            }
1757
1758            if (EntityCategories.HOSTILE.contains(entityType) && flagContainer
1759                    .getFlag(HostileInteractFlag.class).getValue()) {
1760                return;
1761            }
1762
1763            if (EntityCategories.ANIMAL.contains(entityType) && flagContainer
1764                    .getFlag(AnimalInteractFlag.class).getValue()) {
1765                return;
1766            }
1767
1768            // This actually makes use of the interface, so we don't use the
1769            // category
1770            if (entity instanceof Tameable && ((Tameable) entity).isTamed() && flagContainer
1771                    .getFlag(TamedInteractFlag.class).getValue()) {
1772                return;
1773            }
1774
1775            if (EntityCategories.VEHICLE.contains(entityType) && flagContainer
1776                    .getFlag(VehicleUseFlag.class).getValue()) {
1777                return;
1778            }
1779
1780            if (EntityCategories.PLAYER.contains(entityType) && flagContainer
1781                    .getFlag(PlayerInteractFlag.class).getValue()) {
1782                return;
1783            }
1784
1785            if (EntityCategories.INTERACTION.contains(entityType) && flagContainer
1786                    .getFlag(InteractionInteractFlag.class).getValue()) {
1787                return;
1788            }
1789
1790            if (EntityCategories.VILLAGER.contains(entityType) && flagContainer
1791                    .getFlag(VillagerInteractFlag.class).getValue()) {
1792                return;
1793            }
1794
1795            if ((EntityCategories.HANGING.contains(entityType) || EntityCategories.OTHER
1796                    .contains(entityType)) && flagContainer.getFlag(MiscInteractFlag.class)
1797                    .getValue()) {
1798                return;
1799            }
1800
1801            if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER)) {
1802                pp.sendMessage(
1803                        TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1804                        TagResolver.resolver(
1805                                "node",
1806                                Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_INTERACT_OTHER)
1807                        )
1808                );
1809                event.setCancelled(true);
1810            }
1811        }
1812    }
1813
1814    @EventHandler(priority = EventPriority.HIGHEST, ignoreCancelled = true)
1815    public void onVehicleDestroy(VehicleDestroyEvent event) {
1816        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getVehicle().getLocation());
1817        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1818        if (area == null) {
1819            return;
1820        }
1821        Entity attacker = event.getAttacker();
1822        if (attacker instanceof Player p) {
1823            BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(p);
1824            Plot plot = area.getPlot(location);
1825            if (plot == null) {
1826                if (!PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, VehicleBreakFlag.class, true) && !pp.hasPermission(
1827                        Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_VEHICLE_ROAD
1828                )) {
1829                    pp.sendMessage(
1830                            TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1831                            TagResolver.resolver(
1832                                    "node",
1833                                    Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_VEHICLE_ROAD)
1834                            )
1835                    );
1836                    event.setCancelled(true);
1837                }
1838            } else {
1839                if (!plot.hasOwner()) {
1840                    if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_VEHICLE_UNOWNED)) {
1841                        pp.sendMessage(
1842                                TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1843                                TagResolver.resolver(
1844                                        "node",
1845                                        Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_VEHICLE_UNOWNED)
1846                                )
1847                        );
1848                        event.setCancelled(true);
1849                        return;
1850                    }
1851                    return;
1852                }
1853                if (!plot.isAdded(pp.getUUID())) {
1854                    if (plot.getFlag(VehicleBreakFlag.class)) {
1855                        return;
1856                    }
1857                    if (!pp.hasPermission(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_VEHICLE_OTHER)) {
1858                        pp.sendMessage(
1859                                TranslatableCaption.of("permission.no_permission_event"),
1860                                TagResolver.resolver(
1861                                        "node",
1862                                        Tag.inserting(Permission.PERMISSION_ADMIN_DESTROY_VEHICLE_OTHER)
1863                                )
1864                        );
1865                        event.setCancelled(true);
1866                        plot.debug(pp.getName()
1867                                + " could not break vehicle because vehicle-break = false");
1868                    }
1869                }
1870            }
1871        }
1872    }
1873
1874    @EventHandler
1875    public void onItemDrop(PlayerDropItemEvent event) {
1876        Player player = event.getPlayer();
1877        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
1878        Location location = pp.getLocation();
1879        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1880        if (area == null) {
1881            return;
1882        }
1883        Plot plot = location.getOwnedPlot();
1884        if (plot == null) {
1885            if (PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, ItemDropFlag.class, false)) {
1886                event.setCancelled(true);
1887            }
1888            return;
1889        }
1890        UUID uuid = pp.getUUID();
1891        if (!plot.isAdded(uuid)) {
1892            if (!plot.getFlag(ItemDropFlag.class)) {
1893                plot.debug(player.getName() + " could not drop item because of item-drop = false");
1894                event.setCancelled(true);
1895            }
1896        }
1897    }
1898
1899    @EventHandler
1900    public void onItemPickup(EntityPickupItemEvent event) {
1901        LivingEntity ent = event.getEntity();
1902        if (ent instanceof Player player) {
1903            BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
1904            Location location = pp.getLocation();
1905            PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1906            if (area == null) {
1907                return;
1908            }
1909            Plot plot = location.getOwnedPlot();
1910            if (plot == null) {
1911                if (PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, DropProtectionFlag.class, true)) {
1912                    event.setCancelled(true);
1913                }
1914                return;
1915            }
1916            UUID uuid = pp.getUUID();
1917            if (!plot.isAdded(uuid) && plot.getFlag(DropProtectionFlag.class)) {
1918                plot.debug(player.getName() + " could not pick up item because of drop-protection = true");
1919                event.setCancelled(true);
1920            }
1921        }
1922    }
1923
1924    @EventHandler
1925    public void onDeath(final PlayerDeathEvent event) {
1926        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getEntity().getLocation());
1927        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1928        if (area == null) {
1929            return;
1930        }
1931        Plot plot = location.getOwnedPlot();
1932        if (plot == null) {
1933            if (PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, KeepInventoryFlag.class, true)) {
1934                event.setCancelled(true);
1935            }
1936            return;
1937        }
1938        if (plot.getFlag(KeepInventoryFlag.class)) {
1939            plot.debug(event.getEntity().getName() + " kept their inventory because of keep-inventory = true");
1940            event.getDrops().clear();
1941            event.setKeepInventory(true);
1942        }
1943    }
1944
1945    @SuppressWarnings("deprecation") // #getLocate is needed for Spigot compatibility
1946    @EventHandler
1947    public void onLocaleChange(final PlayerLocaleChangeEvent event) {
1948        // The event is fired before the player is deemed online upon login
1949        if (!event.getPlayer().isOnline()) {
1950            return;
1951        }
1952        BukkitPlayer player = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getPlayer());
1953        // we're stripping the country code as we don't want to differ between countries
1954        player.setLocale(Locale.forLanguageTag(event.getLocale().substring(0, 2)));
1955    }
1956
1957    @EventHandler
1958    public void onPortalEnter(PlayerPortalEvent event) {
1959        Location location = BukkitUtil.adapt(event.getPlayer().getLocation());
1960        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
1961        if (area == null) {
1962            return;
1963        }
1964        Plot plot = location.getOwnedPlot();
1965        if (plot == null) {
1966            if (PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, DenyPortalTravelFlag.class, true)) {
1967                event.setCancelled(true);
1968            }
1969            return;
1970        }
1971        if (plot.getFlag(DenyPortalTravelFlag.class)) {
1972            plot.debug(event.getPlayer().getName() + " did not travel thru a portal because of deny-portal-travel = true");
1973            event.setCancelled(true);
1974        }
1975    }
1976
1977    @EventHandler
1978    public void onPortalCreation(PortalCreateEvent event) {
1979        String world = event.getWorld().getName();
1980        if (PlotSquared.get().getPlotAreaManager().getPlotAreasSet(world).size() == 0) {
1981            return;
1982        }
1983        BukkitPlayer pp = (event.getEntity() instanceof Player player) ? BukkitUtil.adapt(player) : null;
1984        int minX = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
1985        int maxX = Integer.MIN_VALUE;
1986        int minZ = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
1987        int maxZ = Integer.MIN_VALUE;
1988        for (BlockState state : event.getBlocks()) {
1989            minX = Math.min(state.getX(), minX);
1990            maxX = Math.max(state.getX(), maxX);
1991            minZ = Math.min(state.getZ(), minZ);
1992            maxZ = Math.max(state.getZ(), maxZ);
1993        }
1994        int y = event.getBlocks().get(0).getY(); // Don't need to worry about this too much
1995        for (Location location : List.of( // We don't care about duplicate locations
1996                Location.at(world, minX, y, minZ),
1997                Location.at(world, minX, y, maxZ),
1998                Location.at(world, maxX, y, minZ),
1999                Location.at(world, maxX, y, maxZ)
2000        )) {
2001            PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
2002            if (area == null) {
2003                continue;
2004            }
2005            if (area.notifyIfOutsideBuildArea(pp, location.getY())) {
2006                event.setCancelled(true);
2007                return;
2008            }
2009            Plot plot = location.getOwnedPlot();
2010            if (plot == null) {
2011                if (PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, DenyPortalsFlag.class, true)) {
2012                    event.setCancelled(true);
2013                    return;
2014                }
2015                continue;
2016            }
2017            if (plot.getFlag(DenyPortalsFlag.class)) {
2018                StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();
2019                if (event.getEntity() != null) {
2020                    builder.append(event.getEntity().getName()).append(" did not create a portal");
2021                } else {
2022                    builder.append("Portal creation cancelled");
2023                }
2024                plot.debug(builder.append(" because of deny-portals = true").toString());
2025                event.setCancelled(true);
2026                return;
2027            }
2028        }
2029    }
2030
2031    @EventHandler
2032    public void onPlayerTakeLecternBook(PlayerTakeLecternBookEvent event) {
2033        Player player = event.getPlayer();
2034        BukkitPlayer pp = BukkitUtil.adapt(player);
2035        Location location = pp.getLocation();
2036        PlotArea area = location.getPlotArea();
2037        if (area == null) {
2038            return;
2039        }
2040        Plot plot = location.getOwnedPlot();
2041        if (plot == null) {
2042            if (PlotFlagUtil.isAreaRoadFlagsAndFlagEquals(area, LecternReadBookFlag.class, true)) {
2043                event.setCancelled(true);
2044            }
2045            return;
2046        }
2047        if (!plot.isAdded(pp.getUUID())) {
2048            if (plot.getFlag(LecternReadBookFlag.class)) {
2049                plot.debug(event.getPlayer().getName() + " could not take the book because of lectern-read-book = true");
2050                event.setCancelled(true);
2051            }
2052        }
2053    }
